verses.niv: 5 If any of you lacks wisdom, he should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to him.
verses.kjv: 5 If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.
verses.esv: 5 If any of you lacks wisdom, let him ask God, who gives generously to all without reproach, and it will be given him.

verses.niv: 17 But the wisdom that comes from heaven is first of all pure; then peace-loving, considerate, submissive, full of mercy and good fruit, impartial and sincere.
verses.esv: 17 But the wisdom from above is first pure, then peaceable, gentle, open to reason, full of mercy and good fruits, impartial and sincere.
verses.kjv: 17 But the wisdom that is from above is first pure, then peaceable, gentle, and easy to be intreated, full of mercy and good fruits, without partiality, and without hypocrisy.

verses.niv: 13 Blessed is the man who finds wisdom, the man who gains understanding, 14 for she is more profitable than silver and yields better returns than gold. 15 She is more precious than rubies; nothing you desire can compare with her. 16 Long life is in her right hand; in her left hand are riches and honor. 17 Her ways are pleasant ways, and all her paths are peace. 18 She is a tree of life to those who embrace her; those who lay hold of her will be blessed.
verses.kjv: 13 Happy is the man that findeth wisdom, and the man that getteth understanding. 14 For the merchandise of it is better than the merchandise of silver, and the gain thereof than fine gold. 15 She is more precious than rubies: and all the things thou canst desire are not to be compared unto her. 16 Length of days is in her right hand; and in her left hand riches and honour. 17 Her ways are ways of pleasantness, and all her paths are peace. 18 She is a tree of life to them that lay hold upon her: and happy is every one that retaineth her.
verses.esv:
13   Blessed is the one who finds wisdom,
    and the one who gets understanding,
14   for the gain from her is better than gain from silver
    and her profit better than gold.
15   She is more precious than jewels,
    and nothing you desire can compare with her.
16   Long life is in her right hand;
    in her left hand are riches and honor.
17   Her ways are ways of pleasantness,
    and all her paths are peace.
18   She is a tree of life to those who lay hold of her;
    those who hold her fast are called blessed.

verses.niv: 7 The fear of the Lord is the beginning of knowledge, but fools despise wisdom and discipline.
verses.kjv: 7 The fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge: but fools despise wisdom and instruction.
verses.esv:
7   The fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge;
    fools despise wisdom and instruction.

verses.niv: 15 Be very careful, then, how you live--not as unwise but as wise, 16 making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil. 17 Therefore do not be foolish, but understand what the Lord's will is.
verses.kjv: 15 See then that ye walk circumspectly, not as fools, but as wise, 16 Redeeming the time, because the days are evil. 17 Wherefore be ye not unwise, but understanding what the will of the Lord is.
verses.esv: 15 Look carefully then how you walk, not as unwise but as wise, 16 making the best use of the time, because the days are evil. 17 Therefore do not be foolish, but understand what the will of the Lord is.

verses.niv: 20 Listen to advice and accept instruction, and in the end you will be wise.
verses.kjv: 20 Hear counsel, and receive instruction, that thou mayest be wise in thy latter end.
verses.esv:
20   Listen to advice and accept instruction,
    that you may gain wisdom in the future.

verses.niv: 15 The way of a fool seems right to him, but a wise man listens to advice.
verses.kjv: 15 The way of a fool is right in his own eyes: but he that hearkeneth unto counsel is wise.
verses.esv:
15   The way of a fool is right in his own eyes,
    but a wise man listens to advice.

verses.niv: 23 A fool finds pleasure in evil conduct, but a man of understanding delights in wisdom.
verses.kjv: 23 It is as sport to a fool to do mischief: but a man of understanding hath wisdom.
verses.esv:
23   Doing wrong is like a joke to a fool,
    but wisdom is pleasure to a man of understanding.

verses.niv: 16 Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly as you teach and admonish one another with all wisdom, and as you sing psalms, hymns and spiritual songs with gratitude in your hearts to God.
verses.kjv: 16 Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
verses.esv: 16 Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly, teaching and admonishing one another in all wisdom, singing psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, with thankfulness in your hearts to God.

verses.niv: 15 The heart of the discerning acquires knowledge; the ears of the wise seek it out.
verses.kjv: 15 The heart of the prudent getteth knowledge; and the ear of the wise seeketh knowledge.
verses.esv:
15   An intelligent heart acquires knowledge,
    and the ear of the wise seeks knowledge.

verses.niv: 6 For the LORD gives wisdom, and from his mouth come knowledge and understanding.
verses.kjv: 6 For the LORD giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.
verses.esv:
6   For the LORD gives wisdom;
    from his mouth come knowledge and understanding;

verses.niv: 10 The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom; all who follow his precepts have good understanding. To him belongs eternal praise.
verses.kjv: 10 The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do his commandments: his praise endureth for ever.
verses.esv:
10   The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom;
    all those who practice it have a good understanding.
    His praise endures forever!

verses.niv: 27 A man of knowledge uses words with restraint, and a man of understanding is even-tempered. 28 Even a fool is thought wise if he keeps silent, and discerning if he holds his tongue.
verses.kjv: 27 He that hath knowledge spareth his words: and a man of understanding is of an excellent spirit. 28 Even a fool, when he holdeth his peace, is counted wise: and he that shutteth his lips is esteemed a man of understanding.
verses.esv:
27   Whoever restrains his words has knowledge,
    and he who has a cool spirit is a man of understanding.
28   Even a fool who keeps silent is considered wise;
    when he closes his lips, he is deemed intelligent.

verses.niv: 15 For I will give you words and wisdom that none of your adversaries will be able to resist or contradict.
verses.kjv: 15 For I will give you a mouth and wisdom, which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist.
verses.esv: 15 for I will give you a mouth and wisdom, which none of your adversaries will be able to withstand or contradict.

verses.niv: 16 How much better to get wisdom than gold, to choose understanding rather than silver!
verses.kjv: 16 How much better is it to get wisdom than gold! and to get understanding rather to be chosen than silver!
verses.esv:
16   How much better to get wisdom than gold!
    To get understanding is to be chosen rather than silver.

verses.niv: 7 Do not be wise in your own eyes; fear the LORD and shun evil.
verses.kjv: 7 Be not wise in thine own eyes: fear the LORD, and depart from evil.
verses.esv:
7   Be not wise in your own eyes;
    fear the LORD, and turn away from evil.

verses.niv: 30 It is because of him that you are in Christ Jesus, who has become for us wisdom from God--that is, our righteousness, holiness and redemption.
verses.kjv: 30 But of him are ye in Christ Jesus, who of God is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption:
verses.esv: 30 And because of him you are in Christ Jesus, who became to us wisdom from God, righteousness and sanctification and redemption,

verses.niv: 10 "The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom, and knowledge of the Holy One is understanding.
verses.kjv: 10 The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: and the knowledge of the holy is understanding.
verses.esv:
10   The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom,
    and the knowledge of the Holy One is insight.

verses.niv: 1 Who is like the wise man? Who knows the explanation of things? Wisdom brightens a man's face and changes its hard appearance.
verses.kjv: 1 Who is as the wise man? and who knoweth the interpretation of a thing? a man’s wisdom maketh his face to shine, and the boldness of his face shall be changed.
verses.esv:
8:1   Who is like the wise?
    And who knows the interpretation of a thing?
  A man’s wisdom makes his face shine,
    and the hardness of his face is changed.

verses.niv: 2 When pride comes, then comes disgrace, but with humility comes wisdom.
verses.kjv: 2 When pride cometh, then cometh shame: but with the lowly is wisdom.
verses.esv:
2   When pride comes, then comes disgrace,
    but with the humble is wisdom.

verses.niv: 6 Do not forsake wisdom, and she will protect you; love her, and she will watch over you. 7 Wisdom is supreme; therefore get wisdom. Though it cost all you have, get understanding.
verses.kjv: 6 Forsake her not, and she shall preserve thee: love her, and she shall keep thee. 7 Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom: and with all thy getting get understanding.
verses.esv:
6   Do not forsake her, and she will keep you;
    love her, and she will guard you.
7   The beginning of wisdom is this: Get wisdom,
    and whatever you get, get insight.

verses.niv: 12 Teach us to number our days aright, that we may gain a heart of wisdom.
verses.kjv: 12 So teach us to number our days, that we may apply our hearts unto wisdom.
verses.esv:
12   So teach us to number our days
    that we may get a heart of wisdom.

verses.niv: 13 Who is wise and understanding among you? Let him show it by his good life, by deeds done in the humility that comes from wisdom.
verses.kjv: 13 Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you? let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom.
verses.esv: 13 Who is wise and understanding among you? By his good conduct let him show his works in the meekness of wisdom.

verses.niv: 33 The fear of the LORD teaches a man wisdom, and humility comes before honor.
verses.kjv: 33 The fear of the LORD is the instruction of wisdom; and before honour is humility.
verses.esv:
33   The fear of the LORD is instruction in wisdom,
    and humility comes before honor.

verses.niv: 12 Wisdom is a shelter as money is a shelter, but the advantage of knowledge is this: that wisdom preserves the life of its possessor.
verses.kjv: 12 For wisdom is a defence, and money is a defence: but the excellency of knowledge is, that wisdom giveth life to them that have it.
verses.esv:
12   For the protection of wisdom is like the protection of money,
    and the advantage of knowledge is that wisdom preserves the life of him who has it.
